source_reference.text: Focus on the Family: Healthy Marriage Trait 1 (Video by Focus on the Family)

content_summary: We created a series of videos for Focus on the Family Malaysia's 2022 "I Do" marriage campaign. This video focuses on one of the traits of a healthy marriage - enjoying shared activities together. The video features Kay Yeow and Rachael's real life story and also includes a segment by Lee Wee Min, founder of Focus on the Family Malaysia, as he shares tips on how we can enjoy shared activities as a couple.
